content: MT-EC-30 Strut end cap Channel end cap for MT-30 strut channels ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Modular support accessories > Modular support system accessories- - - ### FEATURES:Features Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Safer handling – helps protect installers from sharp edges which may be left after cutting the strut channel Improved durability – helps to prevent deformed edges during storage and transport around the construction site Improved aesthetics – strut end caps give your work a neat, professional appearance Applications Helps protect MT-20 strut channel edges from damage during storage and transport Covering any sharp edges left after cutting to size ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: PPB-M02 Surface finish: n/a Weight: 0 lb.
